name: Google Play Games (PC PORT)
description:
This is google play games port on the pc

Immediately I say there only interface in English

System Requirements:

  • Windows 10 version 2004.
  • Solid State Drive (SSD).
  • Gaming GPU.
  • 8 logical CPU cores.
  • 8GB of RAM.
  • 20 GB of free space.
  • Windows administrator account.
  • Hardware virtualization enabled.
  • A compatible computer with a suitable configuration.

Source: https://play.google.com/googleplaygames#section-faqs
